mapper.sql: TIME, STATUS, ORG_COMMAND_ID, ORG_CARRIER_ID, ORG_HOST_COMMAND_ID, ORG_ORIGINATOR, COMMAND_TYPE, ORG_PRIORITY, ORG_REPLACE, ORG_BATCH_FLG, ORG_SRC_TSC_ID, ORG_SRC_LOC, ORG_SRC_ZONE_ID, ORG_DST_GROUP, ORG_DST_TSC_ID, ORG_DST_TSC_ID2, ORG_DST_TSC_ID3, ORG_DST_TSC_ID4, ORG_DST_TSC_ID5, ORG_DST_LOC, ORG_DST_LOC2, ORG_DST_LOC3, ORG_DST_LOC4, ORG_DST_LOC5, ORG_DST_ZONE_ID, ORG_NEXT_DST, ORG_MANDATORY, ORG_ARRIVE_TIME, ORG_DEPART_TIME, ORG_RCV_TIME, ORG_START_TIME, ORG_CMP_TIME, ORG_BATCH_SEQ, ORG_N2_PURGE_FLG, ORG_N2_PURGE_TIME, REROUTE_FLG, REROUTE_TIME, REROUTE_REASON, CANCEL_FLG, CANCEL_TIME, CANCEL_REASON, ALT_FLG, ALT_TSC_ID, ALT_LOC, ALT_REASON, ER_FLG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from MACRO_TRANSFER_LOG
order by ${orderByClause}

update MACRO_TRANSFER_LOG
TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_COMMAND_ID = #{record.orgCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CARRIER_ID = #{record.orgCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_HOST_COMMAND_ID = #{record.orgHostCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ORIGINATOR = #{record.orgOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMAND_TYPE = #{record.commandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_PRIORITY = #{record.orgPriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_REPLACE = #{record.orgReplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_BATCH_FLG = #{record.orgBatchFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_SRC_TSC_ID = #{record.orgSrcTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_SRC_LOC = #{record.orgSrcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_SRC_ZONE_ID = #{record.orgSrcZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_GROUP = #{record.orgDstGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID = #{record.orgDstTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID2 = #{record.orgDstTscId2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID3 = #{record.orgDstTscId3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID4 = #{record.orgDstTscId4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID5 = #{record.orgDstTscId5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_LOC = #{record.orgDstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC2 = #{record.orgDstLoc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC3 = #{record.orgDstLoc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC4 = #{record.orgDstLoc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC5 = #{record.orgDstLoc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_ZONE_ID = #{record.orgDstZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NEXT_DST = #{record.orgNextDst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_MANDATORY = #{record.orgMandatory,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ARRIVE_TIME = #{record.orgArriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DEPART_TIME = #{record.orgDepartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_RCV_TIME = #{record.orgRcvTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_START_TIME = #{record.orgStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CMP_TIME = #{record.orgCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_BATCH_SEQ = #{record.orgBatchSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_N2_PURGE_FLG = #{record.orgN2PurgeFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_N2_PURGE_TIME = #{record.orgN2PurgeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REROUTE_FLG = #{record.rerouteFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REROUTE_TIME = #{record.rerouteTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REROUTE_REASON = #{record.rerouteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCEL_FLG = #{record.cancelFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CANCEL_TIME = #{record.cancelTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CANCEL_REASON = #{record.cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALT_FLG = #{record.altFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALT_TSC_ID = #{record.altTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALT_LOC = #{record.altLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALT_REASON = #{record.altReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ER_FLG = #{record.erFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update MACRO_TRANSFER_LOG
ORG_HOST_COMMAND_ID = #{orgHostCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ORIGINATOR = #{orgOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMAND_TYPE = #{commandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_PRIORITY = #{orgPriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_REPLACE = #{orgReplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_BATCH_FLG = #{orgBatchFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_SRC_TSC_ID = #{orgSrcTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_SRC_LOC = #{orgSrcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_SRC_ZONE_ID = #{orgSrcZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_GROUP = #{orgDstGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID = #{orgDstTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID2 = #{orgDstTscId2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID3 = #{orgDstTscId3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID4 = #{orgDstTscId4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_TSC_ID5 = #{orgDstTscId5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_DST_LOC = #{orgDstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC2 = #{orgDstLoc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC3 = #{orgDstLoc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC4 = #{orgDstLoc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_LOC5 = #{orgDstLoc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DST_ZONE_ID = #{orgDstZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NEXT_DST = #{orgNextDst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_MANDATORY = #{orgMandatory,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ARRIVE_TIME = #{orgArriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DEPART_TIME = #{orgDepartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_RCV_TIME = #{orgRcvTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_START_TIME = #{orgStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CMP_TIME = #{orgCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_BATCH_SEQ = #{orgBatchSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_N2_PURGE_FLG = #{orgN2PurgeFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_N2_PURGE_TIME = #{orgN2PurgeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REROUTE_FLG = #{rerouteFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REROUTE_TIME = #{rerouteTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REROUTE_REASON = #{rerouteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCEL_FLG = #{cancelFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CANCEL_REASON = #{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALT_FLG = #{altFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALT_TSC_ID = #{altTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALT_LOC = #{altLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALT_REASON = #{altReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ER_FLG = #{erFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ORG_COMMAND_ID = #{orgCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORG_CARRIER_ID = #{orgCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MACRO_TRANSFER_LOG set ORG_HOST_COMMAND_ID = #{orgHostCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ORIGINATOR = #{orgOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMAND_TYPE = #{commandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_PRIORITY = #{orgPriority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_REPLACE = #{orgReplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_BATCH_FLG = #{orgBatchFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_SRC_TSC_ID = #{orgSrcTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_SRC_LOC = #{orgSrcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_SRC_ZONE_ID = #{orgSrcZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_GROUP = #{orgDstGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_TSC_ID = #{orgDstTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_DST_TSC_ID2 = #{orgDstTscId2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_DST_TSC_ID3 = #{orgDstTscId3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_DST_TSC_ID4 = #{orgDstTscId4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_DST_TSC_ID5 = #{orgDstTscId5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_DST_LOC = #{orgDstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_LOC2 = #{orgDstLoc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_LOC3 = #{orgDstLoc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_LOC4 = #{orgDstLoc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_LOC5 = #{orgDstLoc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DST_ZONE_ID = #{orgDstZoneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NEXT_DST = #{orgNextDst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_MANDATORY = #{orgMandatory,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_ARRIVE_TIME = #{orgArriveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DEPART_TIME = #{orgDepartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_RCV_TIME = #{orgRcvTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_START_TIME = #{orgStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CMP_TIME = #{orgCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_BATCH_SEQ = #{orgBatchSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_N2_PURGE_FLG = #{orgN2PurgeFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_N2_PURGE_TIME = #{orgN2PurgeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REROUTE_FLG = #{rerouteFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REROUTE_TIME = #{rerouteTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REROUTE_REASON = #{rerouteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCEL_FLG = #{cancelFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANCEL_REASON = #{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALT_FLG = #{altFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALT_TSC_ID = #{altTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALT_LOC = #{altLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALT_REASON = #{altReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ER_FLG = #{erFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ORG_COMMAND_ID = #{orgCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORG_CARRIER_ID = #{orgCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT 0, org_carrier_id,
TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_rcv_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_rcv_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_start_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_start_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_cmp_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_cmp_time, org_src_tsc_id, org_src_loc, org_dst_tsc_id, org_dst_loc, alt_tsc_id, alt_loc,
( CASE status WHEN 0 THEN 'Queued' WHEN 1 THEN 'Executing' WHEN 2 THEN 'Complete' WHEN 3 THEN 'AlternateComp' WHEN 4 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE 'Maintenance' END ) statusStr, org_priority, cancel_flg, + org_dst_group, +
TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS time, org_host_command_id, + org_command_id, + org_originator, + reroute_flg FROM macro_transfer_log WHERE org_command_id = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT 0, org_carrier_id,
TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_rcv_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_rcv_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_start_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_start_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_cmp_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_cmp_time, org_src_tsc_id, org_src_loc, org_dst_tsc_id, org_dst_loc, alt_tsc_id, alt_loc, status, org_priority, cancel_flg, + org_dst_group, +
TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS time, org_host_command_id, + org_command_id, + org_originator, + reroute_flg FROM macro_transfer_log WHERE org_command_id = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY time DESC)
SELECT tsc_abbreviation, tsc_id, tsc_type FROM tsc WHERE tsc_type IN ( 'CDC', 'OCDC','XCDC','STC') ORDER BY 1
SELECT ohb_id, ohb_id, 'OHB' FROM ohb ORDER BY 1
SELECT port_abbreviation, port_id, 'PORT' FROM port ORDER BY 1

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT rownum,
TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_rcv_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_rcv_time, org_carrier_id, ROUND( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( org_cmp_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( org_rcv_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600, 0 ) totalTime, org_src_tsc_id, org_src_loc, ( CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN alt_tsc_id ELSE org_dst_tsc_id END ) tscId, ( CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN alt_loc ELSE org_dst_loc END ) loc,
( CASE status WHEN 0 THEN 'Queued' WHEN 1 THEN 'Executing' WHEN 2 THEN 'Complete' WHEN 3 THEN 'AlternateComp' WHEN 4 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE 'Maintenance' END ) statusStr, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_start_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_start_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_cmp_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_cmp_time,
org_dst_group, org_dst_tsc_id, org_dst_loc, alt_tsc_id, alt_loc, org_priority, org_next_dst, ( CASE cancel_flg WHEN 0 THEN 'Normal' WHEN 1 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE TO_CHAR(cancel_flg) END ) cancelFlgStr, org_host_command_id, org_command_id, org_originator, ( CASE reroute_flg WHEN 0 THEN 'Normal' WHEN 1 THEN 'Reroute' ELSE TO_CHAR(reroute_flg) END ) rerouteFlgStr FROM macro_transfer_log
ORDER BY time DESC )

SELECT rownum, org_rcv_time, org_carrier_id, totalTime, org_src_tsc_id, org_src_loc, tscId, loc, statusStr, org_start_time, org_cmp_time, org_dst_group, org_dst_tsc_id, org_dst_loc, alt_tsc_id, alt_loc, org_priority, org_next_dst, cancelFlgStr, org_host_command_id, org_command_id, org_originator, rerouteFlgStr FROM( SELECT row_number() over(order by time, org_carrier_id) rn, rownum, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_rcv_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_rcv_time,
org_carrier_id, ROUND( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( org_cmp_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( org_rcv_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600, 0 ) totalTime, org_src_tsc_id,
org_src_loc, ( CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN alt_tsc_id ELSE org_dst_tsc_id END ) tscId, ( CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN alt_loc ELSE org_dst_loc END ) loc,
( CASE status WHEN 0 THEN 'Queued' WHEN 1 THEN 'Executing' WHEN 2 THEN 'Complete' WHEN 3 THEN 'AlternateComp' WHEN 4 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE 'Maintenance' END ) statusStr, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_start_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_start_time, TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(org_cmp_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS org_cmp_time,
org_dst_group, org_dst_tsc_id, org_dst_loc, alt_tsc_id, alt_loc, org_priority, org_next_dst, ( CASE cancel_flg WHEN 0 THEN 'Normal' WHEN 1 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE TO_CHAR(cancel_flg) END ) cancelFlgStr, org_host_command_id, org_command_id, org_originator, ( CASE reroute_flg WHEN 0 THEN 'Normal' WHEN 1 THEN 'Reroute' ELSE TO_CHAR(reroute_flg) END ) rerouteFlgStr FROM macro_transfer_log
ORDER BY time DESC )

SELECT TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(atomic_req_time,'yyyymmddhh24missff'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS atomic_req_time,
ROUND( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( (CASE WHEN atomic_cmp_time IS NULL THEN abort_cmp_time ELSE atomic_cmp_time END) , 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600, 0 ) atomic_time, tsc_id, src_loc, dst_loc, priority, route_no, originator, ROUND( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_acq_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600, 0) queued_time, ROUND( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( (CASE WHEN atomic_cmp_time IS NULL THEN abort_cmp_time ELSE atomic_cmp_time END), 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_acq_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600, 0) loaded_time, abort_reason FROM atomic_transfer_log WHERE command_id = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT TSC_ABBREVIATION, TSC_ABBREVIATION FROM TSC
ORDER BY 1
